info.title: Paws and Claws API
info.description: API documentation for the Paws and Claws project

get.summary: Get a list of appointments for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of appointments. Vets and service providers can see all appointments they are associated with, while regular users can only see their own.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Creates a new appointment for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get a single appointment by ID
get.description: Returns a single appointment by its ID. Accessible by the appointment's owner or a vet/service provider.

parameters.name: appointment
parameters.description: ID of the appointment

delete.description: Deletes an appointment. Only the appointment's owner can delete it.

parameters.name: appointment
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to delete

patch.description: Updates an appointment. Only the appointment's owner can update it.

parameters.name: appointment
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to update

post.description: Login user and return token with expiry.

get.summary: Get a list of all categories

403.description: Forbidden: User does not have admin privileges

get.summary: Get a category by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

403.description: Forbidden: User does not have admin privileges

get.summary: Get and filter medical logs for a specific pet
get.description: Returns a chronological list of medical logs for a pet, with optional filtering by date range, diagnosis, or keyword.

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of the pet

parameters.name: diagnosis
parameters.description: Filter by diagnosis keyword

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (if enabled)

post.description: Creates a new medical log and associates it with a pet.

get.summary: Get a single medical log
get.description: Returns a single medical log by ID, accessible only by the pet's owner.

parameters.name: medicalLog
parameters.description: ID of the medical log

delete.description: Deletes a medical log by ID, accessible only by the pet's owner.

parameters.name: medicalLog
parameters.description: ID of the medical log to delete

parameters.name: medicalLog
parameters.description: ID of the medical log to update

get.summary: Get authenticated user's notifications
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all notifications for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

get.summary: Get a single notification
get.description: Retrieves a single notification by its ID. Requires authentication and authorization to ensure the user can only view their own notifications.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: ID of the notification to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to view this notification.

put.description: Marks a specific notification as read. The notification ID is provided in the URL.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: ID of the notification to mark as read

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to mark this notification as read.

delete.description: Deletes a single notification by its ID. Requires authentication and authorization to ensure the user can only delete their own notifications.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: ID of the notification to delete

204.description: Successful operation. No content to return.

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to delete this notification.

get.summary: Check for unread notifications
get.description: Checks if the authenticated user has any unread notifications.

is_read.description: True if no unread notifications exist, false otherwise.

get.summary: Get all cart items for a specific user
get.description: Retrieves all cart items for a user by their ID. Requires the authenticated user to be the owner of the cart.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose cart items to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to access this cart.

put.description: Replaces all existing cart items with a new list. This acts as a full cart replacement. Requires the authenticated user to be the cart owner.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: ID of the cart to update

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this cart.

delete.summary: Delete all items from a user's cart
delete.description: Removes all cart items from a specific cart by its ID. Requires the authenticated user to be the cart owner.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: ID of the cart to clear

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this cart.

get.summary: Get a list of all orders for the current user or all orders for staff/admin

post.summary: Create a new order from the user's cart

get.summary: Get details for a specific order

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to delete

patch.summary: Update the status of a specific order

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to update

get.summary: Get a list of payments, optionally filtered by order
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all payments. SuperAdmins can see all payments, while other users can only see their own. An optional order_id query parameter can be used to filter payments.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Filter payments by a specific order ID

post.description: Creates a new payment for a specified order. The authenticated user must own the order.

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to create a payment for this order.

get.summary: Get a single payment by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific payment record by its ID. Users can only access their own payments unless they are a SuperAdmin.

parameters.name: payment
parameters.description: ID of the payment to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this payment.

delete.description: Deletes a specific payment by its ID. Only SuperAdmins are authorized to perform this action.

parameters.name: payment
parameters.description: ID of the payment to delete

204.description: Payment deleted successfully. No content returned.

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to delete this payment.

get.summary: Get all emergency pet shelter requests for the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves a list of all emergency shelter requests submitted by the currently authenticated user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (if enabled)

200.description: A list of emergency shelter requests.

post.summary: Create a new emergency pet shelter request
post.description: Creates a new emergency shelter request for the authenticated user's pet. The system validates that the pet belongs to the user before creating the request.

requestBody.description: Request payload for creating a new emergency shelter request

pet_id.description: ID of the pet needing shelter

request_date.description: Date of the placing request for emergency shelter

201.description: Emergency pet shelter request created successfully.

message.example: Emergency pet shelter request created successfully.

422.description: Validation Error or Unauthorized Pet Access

pet_id: The selected pet does not belong to your account.

get.summary: Get a specific emergency pet shelter request
get.description: Retrieves a single emergency shelter request by its ID, for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: shelterId
parameters.description: ID of the emergency shelter request

delete.summary: Delete an emergency pet shelter request
delete.description: Deletes an emergency shelter request by its ID, if the request belongs to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: shelterId
parameters.description: ID of the emergency shelter request to delete

get.summary: Get a list of all pets with filtering
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all pets, filtered by search query (name, species, breed) and gender. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query for partial matching on name, species, and breed

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Filter by gender

post.description: Registers a new pet for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get a single pet by ID
get.description: Returns a single pet by its ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: pet
parameters.description: ID of the pet to retrieve

post.summary: Update a pet by ID with method spoofing
post.description: Updates an authenticated user's pet. Requires the user to be the owner of the pet. Uses POST with _method spoofing for file uploads.

parameters.name: pet
parameters.description: ID of the pet to update

delete.description: Deletes an authenticated user's pet. Requires the user to be the owner of the pet.

parameters.name: pet
parameters.description: ID of the pet to delete

get.summary: Get all pet market listings with advanced filtering and sorting
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all pet market listings. Listings can be filtered by pet attributes (name, species, breed, gender) and sorted by date or fee. Full pet data is returned for each listing.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query for partial matching on pet name, species, and breed.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Filter by pet's gender.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by listing type (e.g., 'sale' or 'adoption')

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by listing status (e.g., 'available', 'adopted', 'sold')

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Column to sort by ('date' or 'fee')

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction ('asc' or 'desc')

post.summary: Create a new pet market listing
post.description: Registers a new pet and creates a market listing for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get a specific pet market listing
get.description: Returns a single pet market listing by its ID, including associated pet data.

parameters.name: pet_id
parameters.description: Pet ID of the pet market listing to retrieve

delete.summary: Delete a pet market listing and its associated pet
delete.description: Deletes a pet market listing and the related pet data by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the pet market listing to delete

patch.summary: Update an existing pet market listing
patch.description: Updates a pet market listing. Supports multipart/form-data with _method spoofing.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the pet market listing to update

get.summary: Get list of all pet products
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all pet products, with an option to specify the number of items per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.summary: Create a new pet product (Admin only)
post.description: Creates a new pet product. Requires admin authentication.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not an admin

get.summary: Get a single pet product
get.description: Returns a single pet product by its ID.

parameters.name: petProductid
parameters.description: ID of the pet product

post.summary: Update a pet product (Admin only) using _method spoofing
post.description: Updates an existing pet product by its ID. Requires admin authentication. Supports both file uploads (multipart/form-data) and standard JSON updates.

parameters.name: petProductid
parameters.description: ID of the pet product to update

image_url.description: New image file for the product

403.description: Forbidden - User is not an admin

delete.description: Deletes a pet product by its ID. Requires admin authentication.

parameters.name: petProductid
parameters.description: ID of the pet product to delete

403.description: Forbidden - User is not an admin

get.summary: Get a list of all lost pet reports with filtering and sorting
get.description: Returns a list of all lost pet reports, with options to filter by status and location, and sort by date. Includes associated user and pet details.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter reports by status (e.g., 'missing' or 'found')

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Filter reports by a partial, case-insensitive match on location

parameters.name: sort_date
parameters.description: Sort reports by date_lost in ascending ('asc') or descending ('desc') order. Defaults to 'desc'.

post.summary: Create a new lost pet report
post.description: Creates a new lost pet report for a specific pet.

get.summary: Get a specific lost pet report
get.description: Returns a single lost pet report by its ID, with associated user and pet details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the lost pet report

delete.description: Deletes a specific lost pet report. Only the owner can delete it.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the lost pet report to delete

patch.description: Updates an existing lost pet report. Only the owner of the report can update it.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the lost pet report to update

get.summary: Get a list of all service providers with search functionality
get.description: Returns a list of all registered service providers, filtered by a case-insensitive partial match on their user's first name, last name, email, and username.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Case-insensitive search query for user's first name, last name, email, and username.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Registers a new user and creates a service provider profile. No authentication is required.

get.summary: Get a single service provider by ID
get.description: Returns a single service provider by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the service provider

delete.description: Deletes a service provider profile. Accessible by the service provider themselves or an admin.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user associated with the service provider

403.description: Unauthorized to delete this Service Provider profile.

patch.description: Updates a service provider's profile. Accessible by the service provider themselves or an admin.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user associated with the service provider

403.description: Unauthorized to update this Service Provider profile.

get.summary: Get all users (Admin only)
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

get.summary: Get a single user by ID or slug
get.description: Returns a single user by their ID or slug. Requires authentication. A user can view their own profile, but only an admin can view others.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user

delete.description: Deletes an authenticated user's account. Requires user to be authenticated and deleting their own account.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to delete

patch.summary: Update a user by ID or slug
patch.description: Updates an existing user. Requires authentication. A user can update their own profile, but only an admin can update others. Restricted fields like `is_admin` cannot be updated.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to update

get.summary: Get a list of all vet profiles with search
get.description: Returns a paginated list of vet profiles. Can be filtered by a case-insensitive partial match on first name, last name, email, and username. Requires authentication and administrative privileges.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Case-insensitive search query for first_name, last_name, email, and username.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Registers a new user as a veterinarian and creates their vet profile.

get.summary: Get a single vet profile by user ID
get.description: Returns a single vet profile by its user ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user associated with the vet profile to retrieve

delete.summary: Delete a vet profile by user ID or slug
delete.description: Deletes a vet profile and the associated user. Requires the user to be the owner of the profile or an admin.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user associated with the vet profile to delete

patch.summary: Update a vet profile by user ID or slug
patch.description: Updates a vet profile. Requires the user to be the owner of the profile or an admin.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user associated with the vet profile to update

ErrorResponse.title: Error Response
ErrorResponse.description: Standard error response format for generic errors (e.g., 401, 403, 404, 500)

SuccessResponse.title: Success Response
SuccessResponse.description: Standard success response format for updates and deletes

dob.description: Date of birth of the pet

image_url.description: URL to the pet's profile image

height.description: Height of the pet in cm

weight.description: Weight of the pet in kg

dob.description: Date of birth of the pet

height.description: Height of the pet in cm

weight.description: Weight of the pet in kg

height.description: Height of the pet in cm

weight.description: Weight of the pet in kg

user_id.description: ID of the user selling the pet

pet_id.description: ID of the pet being sold

description.description: Description of the pet for sale

PetMarketPaginatedResponse.title: PetMarketPaginatedResponse
PetMarketPaginatedResponse.description: Paginated list of pet market entries

PetMarketRegisterRequest.title: PetMarketRegisterRequest
PetMarketRegisterRequest.description: Pet market registration payload for an existing pet

pet_id.description: ID of the pet for this listing

_method.description: Method spoofing for PUT/PATCH requests with multipart/form-data

user_id.description: ID of the user who made the appointment

provider_id.description: ID of the service provider or vet for the appointment

pet_id.description: ID of the pet for the appointment
ID of the pet for the appointment

provider_id.description: ID of the service provider or vet for the appointment

rating.description: Rating of the service provider (0.0 to 5.0)
Rating of the service provider (0.0 to 5.0)

user_id.description: ID of the user the notification belongs to

link.description: URL or link related to the notification

is_read.description: Indicates if the notification has been read

created_at.description: Timestamp when the notification was created

user_id.description: ID of the user who reported the pet

location.description: Last known location of the pet
Last known location of the pet
Last known location of the pet

pet_id.description: ID of the pet the log is for
ID of the pet the log is for

user_id.description: ID of the user who made the request

reason.description: Reason for the emergency shelter request

example.reason: My house was flooded due to heavy rain.

request_date.description: Date of the placing request for emergency shelter

EmergencyShelterPaginatedResponse.title: EmergencyShelterPaginatedResponse
EmergencyShelterPaginatedResponse.description: Paginated list of emergency shelter requests

product_id.description: ID of the associated product item

UpdateCartItemRequest.title: UpdateCartItemRequest
UpdateCartItemRequest.description: Request body for updating cart items

user_id.description: ID of the user who placed the order

order_date.description: Date and time of the order

product_id.description: ID of the associated product item

OrderWithItems.title: OrderWithItems
OrderWithItems.description: Order model with associated order items

user_id.description: ID of the user who made the payment

payment_date.description: Date and time of the payment

RegisterPaymentRequest.title: RegisterPaymentRequest
RegisterPaymentRequest.description: Request body for creating a new payment

order_id.description: ID of the order to be paid

tags.name: Lost Pets
tags.description: API Endpoints for reporting and managing lost pets

tags.name: Emergency Shelters
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing emergency pet shelter requests

tags.name: PetProducts
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing pet products

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing product categories
